title: Partnership that delivers results.
subtitle: We operate within a network of licensed Swiss intermediaries and subject-matter experts. Join us and extend your service offering for clients.

highlights.title: Certified network
highlights.desc: Transactions are conducted through licensed Swiss partners in full compliance with KYC/AML and confidentiality standards.

highlights.title: Turnkey B2B scenarios
highlights.desc: Crypto ⇄ fiat, gold, real estate — ready-made processes with support at every step.

highlights.title: Transparent rewards
highlights.desc: Clear partner remuneration scheme and straightforward rules of engagement.

partnerCategories.title: Agents & consultants
partnerCategories.desc: Referral model for independent consultants, traders and financial intermediaries.

partnerCategories.title: Lawyers & notaries
partnerCategories.desc: Client support for asset deals and documentation, integration into ongoing cases.

partnerCategories.title: Real estate & brokers
partnerCategories.desc: Accepting crypto with legal conversion to CHF/EUR/USD/GBP for property transactions.

partnerCategories.title: Financial & exchange services
partnerCategories.desc: Broaden your product line via joint operations with transparent KYC/AML.

howTo.title: Contact us
howTo.desc: Tell us about your cases and client geography. We will propose a working setup.

howTo.title: Align the model
howTo.desc: Referral, white-label or partner integration — we will choose the optimal format.

howTo.title: Launch & support
howTo.desc: We set up the process, playbooks and communications. Ongoing support across deals.

cta.title: Ready to discuss a partnership?
cta.contactNote: You can write via messenger or email — we reply quickly.

legalNote: We do not accept client funds and do not provide investment advice. All operations are conducted through licensed partners in compliance with Swiss law.
